game.name: Lemuria: Lost in Space
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 캡션 이용 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Lemuria: Lost in Space is a unique adventure, full of mysteries, puzzles and shocking discoveries. It's a combination of point 'n click adventure, RPG and survival game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lemuria: Lost in Space is a unique adventure, full of mysteries, puzzles and shocking discoveries. It's a combination of point 'n click adventure, RPG and survival game.

reviewHighlights.text: 개븅신겜 1970년대에 만들어져도 믿을만큼 옛날 느낌 팍팍나는 구조에 재미마저 없음 공짜로 줘도 절대하지말것
